name: Tech Edge
domain: www.techedge.sa
language: en, ar
region: Saudi Arabia, Middle East
industry: Technology, IT Consulting, Digital Transformation

- SaaS Development
- Cloud Computing & Migration
- API Development & Integration

- Staff Augmentation
- Quality Assurance

## Key Services
1. SaaS Product Development
   - Cloud-native applications
   - Modern architecture
   - Scalable solutions

2. API & Microservices
   - RESTful API design
   - GraphQL implementation
   - Service mesh architecture

3. Cloud Implementation
   - Multi-cloud management
   - AWS, Azure, GCP
   - Infrastructure as Code

4. Digital Consulting
   - Business strategy alignment
   - Process automation
   - Compliance solutions

5. Integration Services
   - iPaaS solutions
   - Real-time data sync
   - Enterprise integration

6. Quality Assurance
   - Test automation
   - Performance testing
   - Security testing
